body_html:
@zym1010 I might be wrong, that -lrt is required. The thing is - I found a suggestion to add -lrt before I found a suggestion to add -lm. And after first tests it looked like -lrt is enough. I was not hitting any errors. However, shortly after that, I've noticed your suggestion to add -lm, so I've added it as well :) .

I'm not aware of any real cases, where both flags are needed. Neither I know any cases that would indicate that one flag is better than the other.

Concerning Bazel - I was able to build TF 0.12 with Bazel 0.4.0 so I doubt that most recent version is absolutely necessary. Also, the only issue I ran into, when trying to compile it was associated with the number of threads Bazel bootstrapping script creates.
